items.sentence: I'm looking forward to working with you again.
I can still remember the first time I met you.
Tom got booed by a number of audience members.
I met Tom at a bluegrass festival last summer.
Tom has refused to do what we asked him to do.
That isn't worth the price they're asking for.
I wish that Tom wouldn't take breaks so often.
We think that Tom might be in imminent danger.
Tom knew that it would happen sooner or later.
I can't believe that I just promised Tom that.
Don't you think that Tom might object to this?
Tom probably doesn't know why Mary was crying.
This is going to require a long steady effort.
This is the only possible time for doing that.
This is the same watch that I lost a week ago.
The sound from the next room suddenly stopped.
I could see smoke coming out of Tom's chimney.
The first thing you have to do is contact Tom.
Tom grabbed his son by the scruff of his neck.
Did you bring everything I asked you to bring?
